title: feat: Implement dark/light theme system with Tailwind CSS
description: BEAD-005: Implements theme system with ThemeContext, ThemeToggle component, and CSS variables. Supports light/dark/system modes with localStorage persistence.
reviewComments: Lint errors fixed. Build and lint pass. Theme system implementation approved.

title: Homepage with Hero, Features, and Navigation components
description: Added complete homepage with Tailwind CSS v4 setup, Navigation header, Hero section with gradient styling, and Features grid. Build passes successfully.
reviewComments: Code quality approved. Clean homepage implementation with Navigation, Hero, and Features components. Build and lint pass. Tailwind v4 setup correct.

title: Add documentation pages with sidebar navigation
description:
Implements BEAD-003: Documentation pages with sidebar navigation and content rendering.

- Added react-router-dom for client-side routing
- Created DocsPage component with layout
- Created Sidebar component with nested navigation
- Created DocContent component for rendering
- Added sample docs content (Getting Started, Installation, Quick Start, Guides, Configuration, Deployment, API Reference)
- Set up /docs/:slug routing
- Updated styles for Tailwind and prose
reviewComments: Code quality approved. Clean documentation pages with Sidebar, DocContent components, and routing. Good content structure. Build and lint pass.

title: feat: implement search functionality with modal and keyboard shortcuts
description:
Implements BEAD-004: Build search functionality

- useSearch hook with filtering logic and result scoring
- SearchResults component with highlighting
- SearchModal with backdrop and keyboard navigation
- Search component with Cmd/Ctrl+K shortcut
- Tailwind CSS 4 PostCSS configuration
- Updated App.tsx with header and search integration
reviewComments:
Build passes but lint fails with 6 errors:

1. Search.tsx:77 - react-refresh/only-export-components: Re-exporting hooks and types from a component file breaks fast refresh. Move exports to a separate index.ts or keep them in their source files.

2. SearchModal.tsx:18,32 - react-hooks/set-state-in-effect: setSelectedIndex() called in useEffect causes cascading renders. Reset selection when query changes (derived state) or use a different approach.

3. useSearch.ts:101,103 - react-hooks/set-state-in-render: setIsSearching() called in useMemo can cause infinite loops. Either remove isSearching state entirely (search is synchronous anyway) or compute it differently.

Please fix these lint errors and resubmit.
